popmarket: Thanks for reaching out! Our sophisticated warehouse utilizes the latest technological innovations to help ensure fast order processing. We usually ship via USPS or UPS, and once your order is shipped, it will take 3-8 business days for domestic orders. You'll get a tracking email as soon as your order ships. If you don't see it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well.

send_to_cs: No ESC for this brand, send everything to CS
If customers have issues receiving referral links - send to CS
tone: Don't say "make this up to you" or overdo it trying to be friendly
templates: If a customer slipped/got injured, use the SOI temp
There is a separate return policy for their apparel
dos_and_donts: Always check the product page when they ask about processing times
Don't send the Canadian return link/policy

escalation_preferences: Neg remarks about Clove‚Äôs involvement with pride
When someone claims an injury (and don't apologize)
Complicated fit issues (even outside the 30 day return window)
Aeros Aurora shoe pre-order shipping status

My order not received
Template used: "My item has been with UPS / USPS/ FedEx for a while now, it's not moving - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:48:27.752
Template used: "Sorry 2 - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 17:56:13.923

Clove: I'm sorry about that! To confirm, are you referring to Order #1341816? If so, I checked, and it is still out for delivery. 

Since the package is already with the carrier, it's best to contact them directly. Have you tried giving them a call? They should have the most up-to-date information.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for order status updates
Send to CS if there's a pending ESC and cx ask for an update (even if it's been less than 2 business days)
escalate: ESC immediately if the customer wants an order to arrive at a specific time, or before our standard shipping time
ESC for product info that you can't find on the site
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
templates: If cx sends us their measurements or asks about making a custom sizing order use the CUS template.
If cx mentions that they're going to lose weight, use 'Lose weight' template.
dos_and_donts: Do not recommend the customer go to a place to get measured
"@ The Vault" items are designated for returns/exchanges, but may also be available in other sizes on The Vault website. Always check there first
When the color is closer to white and not cream we say off white
You should never direct the customer to the sizing chart when they mention custom sizing or they send their measurements
Don't tell the customer to hold off on purchase if they are going to lose weight.
drive_to_purchase: When recommending products, make sure they're aligned with the colors, style the cx is looking for
promo_and_exclusions: If cx ask about pricing, tell them to add items to their cart and the best discount will apply automatically
The 40% discount applies automatically when cx add five or more items to their cart
If cx going to purchase a lot of products in one purchase, share with them what you can find on current offer page along with the link: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/current-offers

Template used: "Phone support"; last updated: 2025-12-19 17:23:40.724

Sebastian Cruz Couture: I'm sorry for the delay! The best way to handle this is to email us directly at hello@sebastiancruzcouture.com or you can give us a call at 833-643-6264. Our team is happy to help!
If there's anything else I can help with, please don't hesitate to reach out.

send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately if cx did not receive their order
Send to CS immediately for post purchase inquiries about the status of the mold, or issues with the molds
Send to CS for pricing inquiries
Send to CS if cx is looking for a more specific piece not available on the website
Send to CS if cx is asking for a code and we don't have one
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Use Teeth instead of Pieces (e.g 8 teeth at the top)
templates: If the image is not coming through a second time, send Broken Image temp
For CUSTOM GRILLZ & ACCESSORIES INQUIRIES for models not available on the website use PS shortcut
For urgent concerns/delayed escalation response use PS shortcut
For delayed orders and the customer is frustrated use PS shortcut
For customer service use shortcut CS which has both the direct email/number
dos_and_donts: Do not use the order history as a reference to order status
If customers want to cancel their order always ask for the reason for cancellation
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend pre-made grillz! Upsell to fitted and custom grillz
When recommending an item, let the cx know they can customize their order on the product page
When recommending an item, ask the cx if they are working with a budget
Use LFG shortcut to gather information and provide recommendations when cx ask about:
